Class ReferenceDictionaryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class ReferenceDictionaryBuilder
extends Object

    Manuel Holtgrewe

      • getContigID

        public Integer getContigID(String name)
        Allows contig name to numeric ID translation before final construction of the ReferenceDictionary.
        Parameters:
        name - name of contig to get numeric ID for
        Returns:
        canonical numeric ID for the contig with given name or null if none.
